DSPG 0.1.0
  • Reference

Comprehensive Substance Abuse Prevention Grant Facilities

regional_substance_treatment.Rd

This dataset includes all facilities managed under the Iowa Comprehensive Substance Abuse Prevention Grant regional centers. These 19 regional organizations manage prevention, inpatient, and outpatient substance use facilities in their respective regions of Iowa. The data was collected by Matthew Voss in July 2020.

regional_substance_treatment

Format

A data frame with 129 rows and 11 variables:

classification

The systems of care infrastructure category under which the facility falls; all in this dataset are considered substance use treatment

dataset

For possible future use, all data are in the regional_substance_treatment dataset

regional_org

The regional organization that manages the specific facility in the observation

source

The link from which the data was obtained

location_name

The name of the specific treatment facility

address

The street address of the treatment facility

unit_num

The unit or suite number of the office, if it has one

city

The city of the treatment facility

state

The state of the treatment facility

zip

The zip code of the treatment facility

phone

The phone number for the treatment facility

Contents

  • Format
